lead_paragraph: Arkansas running back Darren McFadden, the 2005 Southeastern Conference freshman of the year, had surgery on his left toe yesterday morning after being involved in a bar fight. He is doubtful for the Razorbacks’ season opener against Southern California on Sept. 2.
